desc:2296691986: Your Penance leans more towards Shadow.
desc:2092047958:
Creating a Halo extends the duration of Apotheosis by {1} sec. If Apotheosis is not active, up to {2} seconds is stored.

While out of combat or affected by a loss of control effect, the duration of Apotheosis is paused for up to {3} sec.
desc:4001974973: While Spirit of Redemption is active, you now appear as a Val'kyr.
desc:366134351: Reduces the effects of your Shadowform.
desc:1296665244: While Entropic Rift is active, Atonement healing with Void Blast and Penance is {1}% more effective.
desc:302812102: Tiger Palm now instead strikes your target with your equipped weapon.
desc:3170525133:
Desperate Prayer lasts an additional {1} sec.

Angelic Bulwark's absorption effect is increased by {2}% of your maximum health.
desc:4019564798: Changes the appearance of your Shackle Undead.
desc:3001643992: Shadow Word: Pain has a chance to empower your next Penance with Shadow, increasing its effectiveness by {1}%.
desc:1594765291: Your Spirit of Redemption is now an active ability with a {1} minute cooldown, but the duration is reduced by {2} sec and you will no longer enter Spirit of Redemption upon dying.
desc:2487489368: Call shadowy tendrils to constrict enemies when Psychic Scream ends, rooting them in place for {1} sec.
desc:3028474926:

$@spelltooltip{1}{2}
desc:357875449: Reduces the cooldown of your Power Word: Shield ability by {1} sec.

desc:3986304431: Flash Heal, Power Word: Shield, Penance, and Power Word: Radiance have a {1}% increased chance to critically heal.
desc:640272105: {1} additional Penance bolts are fired at an enemy within {2} yards when healing an ally with Penance, or fired at an ally within {3} yards when damaging an enemy with Penance.
desc:2556903892: Shadow Word: Pain deals {1}% additional damage and spreads to {2} additional [plural|Target|targets] when you cast Penance to its target.
desc:3744910597: Your healing spells critically strike for {1}% of healing done instead of the usual {2}%.
desc:284927084: Void Eruption sends out slow-moving bolts of Shadow energy at random locations every {1} sec for {2} sec, dealing {3} Shadow damage to all targets within {4} yds, and causing them to flee in Horror for {5} sec.
desc:2367616135:
Tentacle Slam deals {1}% increased damage and Void Volley deals {2}% increased damage.

When Voidform ends, you can cast Void Volley {3} additional [plural|Time|times] within {4} sec.
desc:3062928950: Increases the chance for Shadowy Insight to occur by {1}%. When consuming Shadowy Insight, Mind Blast generates {2} additional Insanity.
desc:1498498348: {1}% of healing done with Flash Heal is replicated to {2} injured allies within {3} yards.
desc:2166803402: Smite extends the duration of an active Atonement by {1} sec.
desc:3892319126:

desc:141725941: Increases the duration of Apotheosis by {1} sec.
desc:3398676299: Increases the duration of Mind Control and Dominate Mind against enemy creatures by {1} sec.
desc:546888099: Prayer of Healing mana cost reduced by {1}% and its cast time is reduced by {2}%.
desc:1497558926: Increases the damage of your spells by {1}%.

desc:4191767860:

desc:374362283: Reduces the mana cost of Flash Heal by {1}%.
desc:2148682161: Reduces the cooldown of your Holy Words by {1} sec.

desc:1925712658: Increases the damage of Holy Nova by {1}%, its healing by {2}%, and its cooldown by {3} sec.

desc:2041512039:
